author: Joanne Lipman
title: Op-Ed: Cancer surgeries and organ transplants are being put off for coronavirus
description: In a given month, more than a million people have some kind of surgery. The elective procedures being postponed because of coronavirus aren't all optional. Cancer patients and organ recipients are being forced to wait.
content:
A consultant analyzing a mammogram.
San Francisco Bay Area surgeon Mary Cardoza is juggling multiple breast cancer patients. But she can't operate on any of them. Breast cancer surgery, it turns out, is considered an elective procedure now put on hold as hos… [+5539 chars]
